headline: Winter Storm Disrupts WM Service And Tests Long Term Investment Story
summary: Waste Management has suspended garbage and trash collection services in parts of Mississippi and Alabama due to severe winter weather. The suspension affects customers across multiple communities and disrupts normal pickup schedules. The company is adjusting operations as conditions evolve, with service resumption subject to weather and safety assessments. For investors watching Waste Management, NYSE:WM, this service disruption highlights how extreme weather can affect day to day...
